LetterGrade.summary: The class LetterGrade presents the grade of letter-based grading system.

Name.value: Gets or sets the student's name.

Subject.value: Gets or sets the name of the subject.

Date.value: Gets or sets the date of the test.

Grade.value: Gets or sets the letter-based grade.
Grade.exception: Thrown when the value of the current grade is not one of the set: A, B, C, D, F.

ConvertionPointToLetter.summary: The overloaded explicit convertion operator. Converts point-based grade to letter-based grade.

ConvertionPercentageToLetter.summary: The overloaded explicit convertion operator. Converts percentage-based grade to letter-based grade.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two LetterGrade instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current grade.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current grade; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current grade.

PercentageGrade.summary: The class PercentageGrade presents the grade of percentage-based grading system.

Name.value: Gets or sets the student's name.

Subject.value: Gets or sets the name of the subject.

Date.value: Gets or sets the date of the test.

Grade.value: Gets or sets the value of the percentage-based grade.
Grade.exception: Thrown when the value of the current grade is less then 0 or more than 100.

ConvertionPointToPercentage.summary: The overloaded explicit convertion operator. Converts point-based grade to percentage-based grade.

ConvertionLetterToPercentage.summary: The overloaded explicit convertion operator. Converts letter-based grade to percentage-based grade.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two PercentageGrade instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current grade.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current grade; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current grade.

PointGrade.summary: The class PointGrade presents the grade of point-based grading system.

Name.value: Gets or sets the student's name.

Subject.value: Gets or sets the name of the subject.

Date.value: Gets or sets the date of the test.

Grade.value: Gets or sets the value of the point-based grade.
Grade.exception: Thrown when the value of the current grade is less then 0 or more than 10.

ConvertionPercentageToPoints.summary: The overloaded explicit convertion operator. Converts percentage-based grade to point-based grade.
